attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In visiting Buckingham Palace on 28 July, I was surprised to see that the 97 heads of state entertained to a state banquet by Queen Elizabeth have yet to include a woman president:  previous prime ministers and foreign secretaries missed the opportunity of suggesting that the Queen invite presidents from Guyana, Iceland, Indonesia, Ireland, Latvia, Malta, Nicaragua, Panama, Philippines, Sri Lanka and Switzerland:  will you demonstrate your enlightenment by suggesting invitations from among the current women presidents of Argentina, Chile, Finland, India, Ireland, Liberia and Philippines?

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
